name: MinotaurEscape
description:
A moment of your time please. We're working hard to make Minotaur Escape better! Please fill out the form below to help us improve the game: https://forms.microsoft.com/e/aPhxdx0yD7

Welcome to Minotaur Escape!

After years of monotonous setting of traps, and cleaning up the mess of dead heroes, you decide it is time to free yourself from this depressing dungeon. Why does this wizard keep you here anyway. Free the heroes and escape the dungeon!

Help the hero escape the dungeons traps by utilising blocks, buttons, time, and even your very self!

Controls W, S, A, DNavigate the maze
SpaceAction button (interact with buttons on the wall)
